description: A ciscoPtpPGMClockChange notification is generated when the
value of cPtpClockParentDSGMClockIdentity is changed.
The Notification contains the PTP new grand master clock
identity.

event.Summary: PTP grand master clock identity $v1 changed

description: This object specifies the parent dataset Grandmaster clock
identity.
variables.name: CISCO-PTP-MIB::cPtpClockParentDSGMClockIdentity

description: A ciscoPtpParentlockChange notification is generated when the
value of cPtpClockParentPortIdentity is changed.
The Notification contains PTP new parent clock identity and the
port
on which this is learnt.
This object specifies the value of portIdentity of the port on
the master that issues the Sync messages used in synchronizing
this clock.
variables.name: CISCO-PTP-MIB::cPtpClockParentDSParentPortIdentity

description: A ciscoPtpRogueMaster notification is generated when the
value of cPtpClockRogueMasterDetect is changed. This object
specifies the ptp rogue master detection on the port

Summary.eval: ($v1==1) ? 'PTP rogue master detected on port $v2' : 'PTP rogue master not detected on port $v2'

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CISCO-PTP-MIB::ciscoPtpRogueMaster CISCO-PTP-MIB::cPtpClockRogueMasterDetect i 1 CISCO-PTP-MIB::cPtpClockPortName s EXAMPLE

description: This object specifies that port receives the PTP packets from
other network, which the device is not interested to sync with.
variables.name: CISCO-PTP-MIB::cPtpClockRogueMasterDetect

description: This object specifies the PTP clock port name configured on the
router.
variables.name: CISCO-PTP-MIB::cPtpClockPortName
